DOC.brief_summary: The objective of this study is to evaluate for the first time not only the impact of neoadjuvant chemotherapy on clinical outcome, but also on liver regeneration after liver resection.
DOC.brief_title: Impact of Preoperative Chemotherapy on Complications and Regeneration After Resection of Colorectal Liver Metastases
DOC.criteria: Liver resection due to colorectal liver metastases between 2003 and 2007 Incomplete assessment of preoperative chemotherapy
